phrasalverb.act on sbâ€™s (advice): To do something because someone has said that you should

phrasalverb.back sth up: To make an extra copy of computer information, for example on a disk or a hard drive

phrasalverb.ask around: Ask many people the same question

phrasalverb.break something in: Wear something a few times so that it doesn't look/feel new

animal.hen:
1. A female bird, especially of a domestic fowl.
2. Domestic fowls of either sex.
3. Used in names of birds, especially waterbirds of the rail family.
3. A female lobster, crab, or salmon.

vegetable.Anise: A Mediterranean plant of the parsley family, cultivated for its aromatic seeds, which are used in cooking and herbal medicine.
